author: becka11y
msg: fixes #162 - better accessibility for timed audio
Added an accessibility hint to time display. Updated code so that record button label is announced each time it is pressed to give feedback to VoiceOver users.  Added a VoiceOver
announcement when timed audio is completed.  Added new strings to en and es resource files.
